{{Use Indian English|date=February 2016}} {{Use dmy dates|date=February 2016}} {{BLP sources|date=December 2010}} {{Infobox person | name = Mukesh Tiwari | image = Mukesh tiwari audio release say yes to love.jpg | caption = Tiwari at the audio release of ''[[Say Yes to Love]]'' | birth_date = 24 August 1965
(age 52) | birth_place = [[Sagar, Madhya Pradesh]], [[India]] | nationality = Indian | alma mater = [[National School of Drama]] | occupation = [[Actor]] | spouse = | imagesize = | yearsactive = 1998–present }} '''Mukesh Tiwari'''{{Cite news|url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Im-known-as-Wasooli-uncle-Mukesh-Tiwari/articleshow/13867456.cms|title=I’m known as Wasooli uncle: Mukesh Tiwari - Times of India|work=The Times of India|access-date=2017-09-28}} (born 24 August 1965) is an Indian film actor known for playing negative and comic roles in [[Bollywood]][http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Rohit-convinced-me-to-do-Vasoolis-role-Mukesh-Tiwari/articleshow/36301547.cms Rohit convinced me to do Vasooli’s role: Mukesh Tiwari]. [[The Times of India]]. Rupali Gupta. 10 June 2014 and [[Cinema of India|several other Indian language films]].[http://www.samaylive.com/gallery/photo-gallery/entertainment-photogallery/pics-every-movie-and-every-role-is-a-challenge-for-me-says-mukesh-tiwari/622811/80138.html ‘वसूली भाई' के लिए हर फिल्म, हर रोल चुनौती]. [[Sahara Samay]]. 8 June 2014[http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/punjabi/movies/news/Mukesh-Tiwari-makes-his-Punjabi-debut/articleshow/46772215.cms Mukesh Tiwari makes his Punjabi debut]. [[The Times of India]]. Jaspreet Kaur. 1 April 2015 he began his acting career with the [[Hindi film]] ''[[China Gate (1998 film)|China Gate]]'', in which he played the role of Jageera. == Early life == Tiwari attended the [[National School of Drama]] (NSD) in 1994.{{Cite web|url=https://nsd.gov.in/delhi/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/NSD-GRADUATES1.pdf|title=NSD GRADUATES|last=NSD|first=|date=28 September 2017|website=www.nsd.gov.in|archive-url=|archivedate=|dead-url=|accessdate=28 September 2017}} ==Filmography== {|class="wikitable" |- ! Film ! Year ! Role !
